text: Scutellastra flexuosa is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Patellidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Subspecies== * Patella flexuosa flexuosa Quoy & Gaimard, 1834 in 1832–35 * Patella flexuosa optima Pilsbry, 1927 ==Description== ==Distribution== ventral view ==References== Category:Patellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1834
title: Scutellastra flexuosa
